title: At APEC summit, Xi calls for global AI regulator, positions China as a trade alternative to the US
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping took centrestage at a meeting of APEC leaders on Saturday to push a proposal for a global body to govern artificial intelligence and position China as an alternative to the United States on trade cooperation.
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping took centre stage at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) leaders’ summit on Saturday, calling for the creation of a global body to regulate artificial intelligence (AI) and positioning China as an alternative to ... [2579 chars]

title: Ignore the doomsayers: AI can drive both growth and jobs
description: As more businesses begin to experiment with artificial intelligence and consider how it might improve their profitability, debates about the implications for workers have intensified. In the US, the apparent disconnect between soaring stock-market valuations and falling total, or non-farm, job openings has fueled media narratives about technologically driven job destruction.
content: As more businesses begin to experiment with artificial intelligence and consider how it might improve their profitability, debates about the implications for workers have intensified. In the US, the apparent disconnect between soaring stock-market va... [6215 chars]

title: Andrew Cuomo slammed for ‘embarrassing’ AI Halloween attack ad on Zohran Mamdani
description: Independent candidate for New York mayor Andrew Cuomo has come under fire for his use of artificial intelligence in a campaign ad attacking his Democratic rival Zohran Mamdani. Titled 'A Zohran Halloween Special', the video features Mamdani knocking on a couple's door and explaining he is dressed as a 'socialist', before taking a handful of sweets.
content: With the New York mayoral election just days away, independent candidate Andrew Cuomo has taken to social media on Halloween to try to warn voters against Democratic rival and frontrunner Zohran Mamdani and Republican candidate Curtis Sliwa – with th... [2339 chars]

title: Education Ministry Offers 5 Free Artificial Intelligence Courses, Details Inside
description: The courses are aimed at equipping students, educators, and professionals with essential AI and data science skills across diverse fields such as sports, education, science, and finance.
content: The Ministry of Education (MoE) is offering five free Artificial Intelligence (AI) courses on the SWAYAM portal to equip students, educators, and professionals with essential AI and data science skills applicable across fields such as sports, educati... [2210 chars]

title: Cybersecurity needs a rethink in the age of agentic AI
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) has entered a new phase. It is shifting from passive tools to autonomous agents that can plan and act across digital and physical systems, often for extended periods and in concert with other agents. Their interacting and collaborating capabilities are scaling quickly, allowing them to perform increasingly complex tasks with minimal human input across sectors such as banking, e-commerce, and logistics.

title: AI collaboration pushes fight against financial fraud in PH
description: FINTECH company Trusting Social marked its seventh year in the Philippines with a renewed call for cross-industry collaboration against financial fraud and cybercrime. The artificial intelligence–driven credit scoring and digital identity firm gathered banking, fintech, and regulatory leaders in Manila for its anniversary event, “7 Years Forward: Powering Financial Inclusion with AI.”

title: Career education options in AI after class 12: Here are 1-year, 3-year, 4-year and 5-year options
description: Artificial Intelligence is shaping every modern industry, and students completing class 12 can now enter this fast-growing field through various study options. From one-year diplomas to full-fledged degree programs, AI education offers pathways that combine coding, data analysis, and problem-solving skills to prepare learners for future-ready careers.

title: Microsoft To Use LinkedIn Data For AI Training By Default, Here's How To Opt Out
description: Microsoft-owned LinkedIn will start collecting user data to train its artificial intelligence (AI) models from Nov. 3, 2025. The professional networking giant announced updates to its terms of service, revealing plans to use member data, including profile details and public posts, to enhance AI-powered features on the platform.
